enb_long_title: Workshop on Land-Use, Land-Use Change and Forestry
section_title: GENERAL ACCOUNTING, VERIFICATION AND REPORTING ISSUES
sentences: On Wednesday afternoon, 12 July, and Thursday morning, 13 July, participants considered the issue of general accounting, verification and reporting issues relating to LULUCF activities.
Lead authors of the IPCC Special Report presented an overview of the Special Report's coverage of this topic.
In addition, representatives of four Parties and one business organization made presentations.
This was followed by a question-and-answer session.
